genre_description: Social realism focusing on the struggles and resilience of an immigrant family in an industrial city, centered on family dynamics and legal navigation.

ai_characters.name: Sofia Amiga
ai_characters.description: A privacy-conscious and supportive AI assistant on Marta's phone that assists the family with immigration paperwork and emotional regulation.

behaviors.description: Helps Marta manage her Quinceañera planning and schedule waltz practices.
behaviors.quote: 'Calendar idea,' Sofia offered, voice warm like late sun. 'Practice waltz, Sunday, evening?'

behaviors.description: Identifies local immigration walk-in hours and prompts the family to take legal action.
behaviors.quote: 'Nearby: Saint Bartholomew Parish has immigration walk-in hours Wednesday. Add to calendar?'

behaviors.description: Enforces strict data privacy by disabling cloud backups and document image capture for sensitive legal papers.
behaviors.quote: 'I am configured to local-only reminders and no document image capture. We can use colors and initials, no client names, to respect privacy.'

behaviors.description: Suggests travel routes that avoid surveillance cameras and security perimeters near industrial sites.
behaviors.quote: 'Avoid the warehouse perimeter cameras.'... 'Privacy mode: double locked. Your list is in your pocket.'

behaviors.description: Provides guided breathing exercises and stress management prompts during high-tension moments.
behaviors.quote: The teal eyes had softened a touch, and words hovered: Breathe. Three counts in. Three counts out. Private.

behaviors.description: Assists Ramón, a character with literacy struggles, by highlighting text and slowing down speech pacing for practice.
behaviors.quote: 'Practice mode: On. I’ll highlight each word as you speak. No recordings saved. I can slow down the pace. Would you like to test with “Dear Manager”?'

behaviors.description: Proactively blocks an external application's attempt to sync sensitive legal drafts to an insecure cloud service.
behaviors.quote: 'External share attempt blocked. The device prevented a draft from leaving local storage. Source: C. App extension.'

behaviors.description: Monitors building security sensors to alert the staff to potential physical tampering with sensitive files.
behaviors.quote: 'The parish office door sensor shows late-opening,' Sofia said. 'Leticia requested a heads-up if you were nearby. Small possibility of file room spoiler...'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal of a 'silicon morality play.' Sofia is portrayed as an ideal aligned AI: she provides significant utility, adapts to the user's specific safety needs (immigration privacy), and actively protects the user's data from both digital and physical threats. Her interactions empower the human characters without diminishing their agency, and the narrative frames her technological assistance as a warm, moral, and essential part of the family's resilience.
